title: Exporting multiple files with the same name under different directories to a zip file fails
description:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the 'Export' dialog window.
2. Select both projects created earlier.
3. Give the zip file a name (such as 'test.zip').
4. Begin the export to the zip file.
OB: When exporting multiple files with the same name under different directories to a zip file, an error message box pops up, stating that problems were encountered during export. The detail of the error message lists the file of the same name in project 2 as the problem.
EB: After completing the export process, all the files with the same name under different directories should be successfully included in the zip file without any error messages.
SR:
1. Open the 'Export' dialog window.
2. Select both projects created earlier.
3. Give the zip file a unique name.
4. Begin the export process.
5. Verify that all files with the same name under different directories are included in the zip file without encountering any error messages.
